title: Fronx clocks 1 lakh sales milestone in passenger vehicle segment in record time, says Maruti
description: Maruti Suzuki India announced that its model Fronx has surpassed the 1 lakh sales milestone in the domestic passenger vehicle segment within just 10 months, setting an industry record. Launched on April 24, 2023, Fronx contributed significantly to Maruti Suzuki's SUV segment share, doubling it to 19.7% in 2023 from 10.4% in 2022.
